Rulings.Base:
1. Placing Bushido Counters does not start a Chain.
2. You still place Bushido Counters if a 'Six Samurai' monster is Special Summoned during the Damage Step.
3. Sending this card to the GY is a cost to activate the Special Summon effect.
4. The Special Summon effect starts a Chain and does not target.

PSCT.Base: Each time a "Six Samurai" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 1 Bushido Counter on this card. You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Six Samurai" or "Shien" Effect Monster from your Main Deck, whose Level is less than or equal to the number of Bushido Counters on this card.
